NOMI suspect follow clinical sign occur : new onset oliguria ( urine output < 0.5 mL/kg/hour least 6 hour ) anuria , abdominal distention decrease absent bowel sound , elevate serum lactate level > 5.0mmol/L metabolic acidosis ( base excess < -5mmol/L ) .
